description:
Tittle & Perlmuter: Representing The Injured Throughout Northeast Ohio And Beyond

If you have suffered a serious injury as the result of the negligence of another, such as a car accident or medical malpractice, you likely have questions regarding your recovery, your future, or how you can overcome the loss of a loved one. How will I pay for my medical bills? Will my insurance cover all my expenses or just a portion? What will happen to my career if my injuries result in a permanent disability? How can my family pay for the funeral expenses? At Tittle Law, L.L.C., we understand that people don't go looking for a personal injury attorney when things are going well — they turn to us when facing some of life's most challenging moments. As a personal injury practice, we are committed to helping accident victims and their families secure just compensation and benefits to recover physically as well as financially. By taking a hands-on approach, we will work closely with you, clearly outline your options, and aggressively pursue maximum compensation at the negotiation table or in the courtroom.

Although we can't change the fact that you were injured by someone’s negligence, we will place our experience and resources to work helping you and your family move forward after the following:

Personal injury:

  • Car accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Bicycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Dog Bites
  • Boating Accidents
  • Elder and Nursing Home Abuse and Neglect
  • Police Misconduct and Jail Death
  • Wrongful death claims

Whether you suffered serious injuries in a car wreck or you lost a loved one in an accident caused by another person's negligence, we will stand with you, outline your options for securing the compensation you deserve, and surround you with the support and legal protection to guide you through.

A Firm Focused On Helping You And Your Family Recover

To schedule a consultation at our law office in Elyria, Ohio, reach out and speak with us. It's important to act quickly after an accident, so don't hesitate, call us and learn how we can protect you, your family and your future.

Tittle Law. For Truth. For Justice. For You.
